text: Arie-Jan "Aad" van Dulst (May 9, 1929 in Rotterdam - March 5, 2001 in Hoofddorp) was a Dutch politician of the Christian Historical Union (CHU) and its successor the Christian Democratic Appeal (CDA). He was a councillor in Hilversum and The Hague, and mayor of Tietjerksteradeel and Haarlemmermeer. Van Dulst studied theology at Utrecht University. He worked as a journalist for regional newspapers, at NRCV radio, and as a director. title: Aad van Dulst
